sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { CompanyService } from "../company.service"; import { Company } from "../models"; @Component({ selector: "app-company-list", templateUrl: "./company-list.component.html", styleUrls: ["./company-list.component.css"], }) export class CompanyListComponent implements OnInit { companies: Company[] = []; constructor(private svc: CompanyService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.svc.list$().subscribe((list) => (this.companies = list)); } deleteCompany(c: Company) { if (confirm(`Delete company "${c.companyName}"?`)) { this.svc.delete(c.id); } } }

add New Company
